channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Where Trump Won: The Sun Belt
item.description: In the South and the West, as in the Midwest, the Trump campaign’s victory depended upon the big cities and the suburbs.

item.title: Reining In the AI Regulators
item.description: Government should err on the side of caution when it comes to regulatory intervention in nascent industries like AI.

item.title: The Biden-Harris ATF Has Gun Shops in Its Crosshairs
item.description: The administration has launched a war of attrition against the vendors who make Americans’ Second Amendment rights effective.

item.title: Texas has right to build razor wire border wall, appeals court rules
item.description: A federal appeals court ruled Wednesday that the Biden administration overstepped when it tried to dismantle Texas's razor-wire border fence.

item.title: The Intellectual Collapse of DEI
item.description: DEI has been one of the most morally perverse and damaging fads in recent American history.

item.title: Appeals court rules Texas has right to build razor wire border wall to deter illegal immigration: 'Huge win'
item.description: A federal appeals court ruled Wednesday that Texas may build a razor wire border wall to deter illegal immigration into the Lone Star State.

item.title: Mexico's president agrees to stop migration into U.S. after tariff threats, Trump says
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump said Mexico has agreed to stop the flow of migrants north into the U.S.

item.title: Iowa Rep. Mariannette Miller-Meeks beats Dem challenger in state's 1st Congressional District
item.description: Iowa Republican Rep. Mariannette Miller-Meeks squared up against Democratic challenger Christina Bohannan in the race for the state's 1st Congressiona...

item.title: Ohio governor signs bill banning opposite-sex bathroom, locker room use at schools
item.description: Ohio Gov. Mike DeWine signed legislation prohibiting students from using opposite-sex locker rooms and restrooms, a measure aimed at barring male-born...

item.title: Texas governor, incoming border czar celebrate Thanksgiving on the border
item.description: Texas Gov. Greg Abbott and incoming border czar Tom Homan thanked and served meals to hundreds of Texas National Guard soldiers, Texas Department of P...

item.title: Democrat Derek Tran unseats Rep. Michelle Steel in California's 45th Congressional District
item.description: U.S. Army Veteran Derek Tran has won California 45th Congressional District, unseating Rep. Michelle Streel in one of the state's most closely-watched...

item.title: Trump says Mexico will stop flow of migrants after speaking with Mexican president following tariff threats
item.description: President-elect Trump on Wednesday said he had a productive conversation with Mexican President Claudia Sheinbaum Pardo over the phone.

item.title: The New York Times Gets the University of Florida Wrong
item.description: The paper of record mischaracterizes recent efforts to reform Florida’s flagship state university.

item.title: Mark Zuckerberg dines with Trump at Mar-a-Lago
item.description: Donald Trump dined on Wednesday with Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg at the president-elect's Mar-a-Lago club in Florida, bringing together the Facebook foun...

item.title: Homan taking death threats against him 'more seriously' after Trump officials targeted with violent threats
item.description: Incoming Trump border czar Tom Homan says his family has received death threats in the past and that the recent threats against Trump officials means ...
